description:
The Applied Psychology Dissertation (PSYC7800) is an essential part of the MAppPsych program, requiring students to conduct an empirical research project of no less than 5000 words and up to maximum of 10,000 words. Each student's topic must be approved by the program director and should be field-based. 
Students enrol in PSYC7800 for 2 semesters, Part A in their first semester and Part B for the final semester.
